title: England eye dominant decade over resurgent Ireland
description: England travel to Cork in Women's Six Nations on Saturday to face Ireland, knowing victory would complete a clean sweep spanning 10 years.

title: Matthews returns as England make three changes
description: England head coach John Mitchell makes three changes to his starting XV to face Ireland in Cork in the Women's Six Nations on Saturday with World Cup-winning number eight Alex Matthews returning.

title: England edge France by a point to claim Grand Slam
description: England hold off a late France fightback to secure a fourth consecutive Women's Six Nations Grand Slam and a seventh straight title.

title: England thrash Scotland to set up Grand Slam-decider
description: England score nine tries to hammer Scotland in Leicester and set up a Women's Six Nations Grand Slam-decider with France at Allianz Stadium next Saturday.

title: Stocks gain on hopes Trump will ease tensions with the Fed -- and China
description: The Dow Jones advanced after Trump said he wouldn't fire Fed Chair Jerome Powell and on hopes of easing tensions over tariffs with China.

title: That Viral Trump Tweet About Impeaching Presidents if the Dow Drops Is Fake
description: Yes, America's fascist president is destroying the U.S. economy. But that ironic tweet isn't real.

title: Markets Bounce Back Slightly After Historic Losses Spurred by Trump’s Tariffs
description: Financial markets continue to reel from Trump's tariffs. But on April 8, the Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 3.6%, as of 10:12 a.m. ET.

title: Dow Jones Futures: Trump Calls Powell 'Loser'; Apple, Nvidia, Tesla Sell Off
description: Apple and Nvidia were big losers Monday. Tesla skidded ahead of Tuesday's Q1 earnings report.

title: US stock futures plummet in the wake of Trump's tariffs announcement
description: The reaction to Trump's sweeping tariffs announcement didn't take long to hit the U.S. stock market, with Dow Futures plummeting over 1,000 points by Wednesday evening.

title: Trump recognises tariff 'transition problems' as US markets fall again
description: The White House also confirmed that the tariffs on China would reach 145% due to a pre-existing 20% levy on fentanyl

title: Asian markets rebound, US futures edge up amid Trump tariff turmoil
description: Asian markets opened up on Tuesday after posting significant losses on Monday driven by President Donald Trump's global tariffs campaign.

title: Democrats hammer Trump for his weekend of golf as stocks tumble
description: Dow futures opened Sunday evening down 1,500 points, or 4% percent., while the S&P 500 and NASDAQ 100 futures were also down 4%.

title: Stock markets slide deeper amid Trump tariffs fallout
description: Key foreign stock markets continued their slide after opening on Friday morning amid the shockwaves of President Donald Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariffs.

title: Global markets rise along with US futures amid tariff uncertainty
description: Markets in Asia and Europe ticked higher on Tuesday, as U.S. futures signalled a potentially narrow rise amid uncertainty over President Donald Trump's tariff plan.

title: Dow Slides Another 1k Points. Nasdaq on Pace to Enter Bear Market
description: The Dow, S&P 500, and Nasdaq are sliding as the stock market reels from a massive selloff following President Donald Trump's shock tariffs announcement.

title: U.S. stocks drop as Nvidia slides and the fog of Trump's trade war thickens
description: The S&P 500 sank 2.2% after falling as much as 3.3% earlier. Such an amount would have vied for one of its worst losses in years before the historic swings that have upended Wall Street in recent weeks.

title: Asian markets, US futures slide as Trump's new China tariffs go into effect
description: Asian stocks plunged again during Wednesday's trading session after President Donald Trump's latest batch of sanctions on China came into force.

title: Trumps Zollankündigung: Börsenkurse fallen weltweit
description: Ob Dax, Dow Jones oder Nikkei: Alle melden nach der Zollankündigung Donald Trumps Verluste. Besonders deutlich die amerikanischen und asiatischen Aktienmärkte.

title: Stock markets rally after Trump pauses most tariffs for 90 days
description: Stock markets rallied in Thursday trading in response to President Donald Trump's dramatic decision to suspend planned tariffs on most American trading partners.

title: Stock market today: Dow surges 600 points, S&P 500 has best week since 2023 to cap wild week of tariff-fueled chaos
description: Wall Street is set to wrap up another week of tariff-fueled turmoil.

title: Markets react to Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs as stocks plunge in after-hours trading
description: US stock futures cratered after Trump unveiled his long-anticipated tariffs in an address at the White House Rose Garden on Wednesday.

title: Inside one of the wildest weeks for markets in recent memory
description: "It seems that we go from panic to euphoria to terror," one analyst told Business Insider. Stocks and bonds swung violently, while the dollar plunged.

title: How a false X post about pausing tariffs led to multi-trillion-dollar market swings
description: What began as a misquoted Fox News interview led to a flood of false and misleading posts on X. Before it was corrected, stock markets rallied then plummeted again.

title: Ken Griffin says Trump is 'eroding the American brand'
description: Billionaire hedge funder Ken Griffin says Donald Trump's tariffs are damaging views of the US that could take a 'very long time' to repair.

title: Trump is digging in on tariffs and GOP leaders have his back
description: Speaker Mike Johnson and Senate Majority Leader John Thune said a bipartisan bill to rein in Trump's tariffs is unlikely to go anywhere.

title: US stocks dive after another stunning reversal as uncertainty reigns about Trump's tariffs
description: U.S. stocks dove Tuesday following another stunning reversal, with Wall Street veering from a huge gain at the opening of trading to more losses at the close...

title: EN DIRECT | Angleterre-France : suivez le Tournoi des six nations féminin
description: Invaincues dans cette édition, les Bleues et les Red Roses s’affrontent pour le titre samedi 26 avril à Twickenham. Manae Feleu et ses coéquipières réussiront-elles à priver leurs rivales d’un septième sacre de rang dans le Tournoi des six nations ?

title: US stocks rally as Trump signals thaw in trade war, Tesla shares soar
description: Tariffs on China will "come down substantially," Trump said late Tuesday.

title: Asian stock markets slide as Trump tariff selloff deepens
description: Key Asian stock markets tumbled upon opening on Monday as the world's reaction to President Donald Trump's tariffs campaign continued.

title: Trump Says Things Are ‘Going Very Well’ After Worst Stock Market Drop in Years Over Tariffs
description: “The markets are going to boom, the stock is going to boom, the country is going to boom,” Trump said.

description: U.S. stock futures moved lower Wednesday morning as investors braced for another wave of geopolitical and earnings headlines. Nasdaq futures dropped more than 1%, with the S&P 500 off 0.5% and the Dow Jones Industrial Average flat. Read more...

title: Earnings season meets upheaval as Trump tariffs test corporate confidence
description: U.S. stock futures were mixed early Tuesday as markets braced for a high-stakes earnings deluge. Dow Jones Industrial Average futures rose 0.3%, while the S&P 500 was flat. Nasdaq futures ticked down slightly. Read more...

title: Global stock markets up amid Trump tariffs exemptions for electronics
description: Major stock markets in Asia and Europe rose in Monday trading following the U.S. announcement that key consumer electronics would be temporarily exempted from tariffs.

title: Jobs report set to offer gauge of economic health amid Trump's tariffs
description: Economists expect hiring to have slowed in March.
